intro: ^This is a strange world you are looking into on this day.

^This world is known as Acarno, a wondrous world where monsters and humans coexisted a long time ago, but now monsters and humans mostly became one. Humanoids with animal and monstrous elements roam this land.
^This story is about 4 of those monster girls and their quest to well... pay their rent.
^Yuki the Soldier Seal, Makra the Shadow Spider, Claire the Noble Dragon and Willow the Obstinate Koala.
^On this quest, those 4 will make enemies, friends and perhaps even find love. So let's get to it, shall we?
^Why Am I the one cleaning the floor?! I was the one who found the most gold this week! I deserve to skip this filthy task!
^It's your turn Claire stop whinging and keep sweeping!
^Well we could use some of our gold to repair the ceiling, then you would have less dust to sweep next time.
^Don't you dare use some of our precious gold for that! I need it to reclaim my title of Noblesse as soon as possible!
^Then stop crying about it and sweep! Why do you even want to go back to being a noble, didn't you folks throw you out like garbage?
^Willow! You do not have permission to talk about me with that tone of voice and how dare you call me garbage!
^Clearly! You would have better manners if I was!
^You wanna throw down, you overgrown lizard!
^Girls please, let's calm down... Here both of you drink some tea, this will calm you down.
^There, now both of you stay calm while we wait for Makra to come back with the food.
^Hopefully she will buy some fresh bread this time.
^I got food... bread and some dry goat...
^Goat? Why I never would have eaten that if it was not for my current situation.
^Yeah... I get'cha... But we need to eat.
^Oi! I'm starving let's just eat already.
^Let's enjoy a nice meal together! I have the feeling this will be a nice day!
^You had to run your mouth again Yuki! Let's see what's up girls!
^The girls grab their weapons and go outside
^Bandits... again, sigh Why don't they leave us alone.
^You filthy brigands! How dare you attack us we? We already told you this house won't be yours!
^It's the only thing we own! Why don't you leave us alone!
^Sorry girlies, we need that place, just piss off or it will get ugly!
^Oi don't you dare touch that place! We grabbed it first! Why do you even want it, you morons!
^Can't say, but orders are orders it's just business, if you won't leave then we'll make you leave in a casket! Let's go boys!
